tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE WindSpeedStatistics (
  altitude INT,
  min_wind_speed FLOAT,
  max_wind_speed FLOAT,
  avg_wind_speed FLOAT,
  last_updated TIMESTAMP
) PRIMARY KEY (altitude);

CREATE TABLE SensorData (
    sensor_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id UUID NOT NULL,
    altitude_id UUID REFERENCES AltitudeLevels(altitude_id),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    sensor_value FLOAT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE measurement_data (
  measurement_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  altitude_id INT REFERENCES altitude_data(altitude_id),
  location_id INT REFERENCES location_data(location_id),
  measurement_time TIMESTAMP,
  measurement_value FLOAT
);
